long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple CSS injector for ITU's Ninova

- Create themes that are fully customizeable
- Unlock "right-click" on Zoom recording pages
- Show lesson names alongside the lesson codes

gh: https://github.com/Cenngo/Ninova-Beautifier/
long.tr:
ITU Ninova Arayuzu icin CSS Injector

-Ozellestirilebilir Temalar olustur
-Zoom kayit sayfasinda "sag-tiklama"yi aktiflestir
-Dersler listesinde ders kodlarinin yaninda ders isimlerini goruntule

gh: https://github.com/Cenngo/Ninova-Beautifier/
